column1: #text=Last month I rode on an airplane to visit my family in California .
#text=I had purchased the tickets online the month before , so everything was ready to go .
#text=I packed all the clothes , toiletries , books , and other things I would need for the trip the night before , then I went to bed early to make sure I would be rested up for the trip .
#text=I woke up the next morning and took a taxi cab to the airport .
#text=The cab driver dropped me off at the front of the airport , and told me which way to go to make my plane .
#text=I headed in the direction of American Airlines , and got in line at the check in stand .
#text=When my turn came I showed the lady my boarding pass , and she explained all the rules of flying to me .
#text=She then directed me to another part of the airport where I would board the plane at .
#text=Before I could get on the plane they made me go through a metal detector and checked me bags .
#text=I got on the plane and found my seat .
#text=A lady showed everyone on the plane what to do in case something went wrong , then the plane took off .
#text=It was just a short flight , so there was no food served , but we did get drinks .
#text=Before long they made an announcement that we were about to land , and sure enough , they told us to buckle our seat belts .
#text=After the plane landed we all got off , and I said hello to my family , who was waiting at the airport in California for me !
